name: My Soul Trapped in a WIN98 PC
summary: My Soul Trapped in a WIN98 PC (ST98.WAD) is a January 2015 techbase map designed for Boom-compatible source ports by Lucas Hernandez (Lukasxd). Most of the level's textures are graphics from Windows 98 and 1990s Internet programs, and it uses the music track "Earthlight" from the game Einhänder.
